entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Default Validation Errors in API (.NET 6 Preview 7) #35746
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, area-web-frameworks
  • [RSG] Avoid declaration generation code for cshtml files #35744
    bug, area-razor.compiler, 6.0-rc2
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_dapper #35739
    Perf, perf-regression
  • Create an analyzer that warns when a parameter on a route handler delegate has a BindAsync method that doesn't comply with RequestDelegateFactory requirements #35733
    feature-minimal-actions
  • ClientTimesoutWhenHandshakeResponseTakesTooLong test failure #35728
    test-failure
  • Create an analyzer that warns when delegates are mapped to GET, DELETE, or HEAD requests and expect a request body #35727
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Add & publish a cm.1 file for each .rpm we ship #35725
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Startup regression: single_query #35723
    Perf, perf-regression
  • Be smarter about providing fully qualified Component completion items #35716
    Perf, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, 17.0-Preview4
  • Big-endian platforms not supported #35709
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
  • Remove reference to PhysicalFileProvider from WebViewManager to fix iOS App Store publishing #35707
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-desktop
  • Responsive flex layout is not working in Blazor Virtualize #35700
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-virtualization
  • HTTP/3: Investigate flakey interop tests #35699
    area-runtime, HTTP3
  • RZ10012 warning cannot be upgraded to error in .editorconfig #35698
    area-razor.compiler, feature-razor-sdk
  • Exception OnParametersSetAsync with CascadingParameter #35696
    area-blazor
  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #35695
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • API Review: WithTags, ITagsMetadata, TagsAttribute #35693
    api-suggestion, api-ready-for-review, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Migrate VSCode semantic tokens to official API #35692
    task, area-razor.tooling, razor.tooling-fundamentals, Razor.Tooling
  • Test Failure: `ConnectionClosedTokenFiresOnServerAbort` #35686
    test-failure, area-runtime, Backlog
  • Test failure: `StatusCode204StopsLongPollingTriggersOnClosed` #35684
    test-failure, area-signalr
  • Minimal APIs doesn't describe it's implicit 400 and 415 response behaviors to ApiExplorer #35683
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks

Closed

  • Guid/String type convert error when extend IdentityUser<Guid> #35374
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: By Design, area-identity, Status: Resolved, Backlog
  • hotreload breaks blazor webassembly with asp and user defined base path - missing blazor-hotreload.js returns 404 #35555
    investigate, area-blazor, Author: Migration Bot :robot:, 6.0-rc2
  • Specific component for dealing with large amounts of text data (InputTextArea) #30291
    Done, enhancement, area-blazor, severity-blocking, affected-medium, feature-blazor-server-experience, 6.0-rc2
  • Razor Comment Colorization doesn't colorize all lines #27447
    bug, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vscode, 17.0-Preview4
  • Keyboard input doesn't work for InputDateType.DateTimeLocal #35498
    Done, investigate, area-blazor, feature-accessibility, 6.0-rc2
  • Add analyzer to check for closing over loop variable #10476
    enhancement, area-blazor, analyzer, feature-razor.language, affected-few, severity-minor, Backlog
  • `Components.E2ETests.ServerTransportsTest`s Failing (not quarantined) #35481
    Done, test-failure, area-blazor, blazor-server, 6.0-rc2
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_ef #35667
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Startup improvement: updates #35724
    Perf, perf-regression
  • SVG <animate> element does not animate when the "begin" attribute begins immediately (value of "0s"). #35697
    area-blazor, feature-svg
  • QUESTION: How to configure ASP.net Core to work with kubernetes NGINX ingress #35660
    area-runtime, Needs: Attention :wave:
  • Slow File download speed using HTTP.sys #35612
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Duplicate, Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, Status: Resolved
  • .Net 6 p7 Wasm publised throws Blazor detected a change in the application's culture that is not supported with the current project configuration #35550
    investigate, Needs: Author Feedback, area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • SPA templates bootstrap 5 update #35702
    area-mvc, feature-spa
  • Startup regression: fortunes_ef #35666
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Change applied to Blazor WebAssembly app using .NET Hot Reload don't show up after adding binding code #34446
    bug, Done, External, area-blazor, feature-hot-reload, 6.0-rc2
  • VSCode - Razor extension crashes when directory contains plus sign #33144
    bug, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, 17.0-Preview4
  • Blazor wasm: Uncaught (in promise) Error: System.InvalidOperationException: There was an error parsing the event arguments. EventId: '13'. #35348
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • Request QueryString keys became case-sensitive #35662
    bug, area-runtime, 6.0-rc1
  • Provide a sample for generating JavaScript components that wrap Razor components #35112
    Done, task, area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • Autogenerated code can't compile in VS preview version. #35554
    Author: Migration Bot :robot:, area-razor.compiler, 6.0-rc2
  • VS Code: Open Views/Shared/_Layout.cshtml and type " @da ", error info is no appear in PROBLEMS window. #35603
    area-razor.tooling
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext #35649
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Blazor InputFile RequestImageFileAsync not revoking ObjectURL #35156
    bug, Done, area-blazor, good first issue, 6.0-rc2
  • started getting JWT Error : www-authenticate: Bearer error="invalid_token" after porting from .NET 5 to .NET 6 #35664
    area-security
  • TagHelper attribute colorization is broken cross-themes #35643
    bug, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, 17.0-Preview4

Updated

  • LSP Platform's snippet application tech should be smarter to not obstruct cursor movement #33678
    bug, External, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, 17.0-Preview4
  • UserManager.SetAuthenticationTokenAsync() is not updating an entity #35656
    investigate, area-identity, 6.0-rc2
  • Response buffering #27470
    enhancement, area-runtime, feature-middleware, severity-minor, affected-medium, .NET 7-Candidate
  • ASP.NET Core Roadmap for .NET 6 #27883
    feature-platform, area-runtime, Epic, roadmap, 6.0.0
  • Semantic tokens experience improvements aka "Project Palette" #33200
    blocked, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.languageserver, feature-razor.vs, 17.0-Preview4
  • Styling issues in identity UI #35446
    area-identity, identity-UI, 6.0-rc2
  • ProtectKeysWithCertificate(thumbprint) does NOT Throw an Exception if the Certificate is Inaccessible due to Permissions #35602
    bug, investigate, area-dataprotection, 6.0-rc2
  • "DenyAnonymousAuthorizationRequirement" is not respecting "AuthorizationOptions.InvokeHandlersAfterFailure" #35610
    area-security, Discussions
  • [Blazor] Availability of User in Startup #35611
    area-blazor
  • `IDataProtectionKeyContext.DataProtectionKeys` property should have `set` accessor #35599
    area-dataprotection, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Won't Fix, Status: Resolved
  • Package Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.EntityFrameworkCore 5.0.0 is not compatible with net50 (.NETFramework,Version=v5.0). Package Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.EntityFrameworkCore 5.0.0 supports: netstandard2.1 (.NETStandard,Version=v2.1) #35552
    area-dataprotection
  • Support Blazor properly for All ASP.Net Identity Scaffolded pages (i.e., not Razor Pages) #35551
    area-identity, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • Analyzers for Minimal APIs #35528
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • In most cases, the site can be started up during production. Occasionally, an error of 500.30 will be reported when the site is started up #35647
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-runtime
  • [SignalR] Provide a way for Azure SignalR to read HttpConnectionDispatcherOptions #35544
    area-signalr, 6.0-rc2
  • I set the BlazorWebAssemblyLoadAllGlobalizationData property to true but not working after publish in .net 6 preview 7 #35338
    investigate, area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, json_nodejs, plaintext #35625
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Dashes in a hosted Blazor WebAssembly project name break OIDC security #35337
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, feature-blazor-wasm-auth
  • Improve routing performance with constant stackalloc when matching #32569
    task, Perf, area-mvc, feature-routing, Backlog
  • Additional Diagnostics in .NET 6 #34578
    area-mvc, area-runtime, 6.0-rc1
  • Blazor WebAssembly fails with error loading blazor-hotreload.js when running in VS debugger #34962
    bug, Working, area-blazor, feature-hot-reload, 6.0-rc2
  • Support serving of pre-GZIP encoded files #2458
    Needs: Design, enhancement, feature-StaticFiles, area-runtime, feature-middleware, severity-minor, affected-medium, Backlog
  • .NET 6 - blazor-hotreload.js is missing from _framework folder #35194
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, Discussions
  • Feature request: strongly-typed route values in `a` tag-helpers #35376
    area-mvc, feature-routing, feature-mvc-razor-views, Backlog
  • enpoints.MapRazorPages() throwing an exception. #35365
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-mvc, Status: No Recent Activity
  • [Feature] Custom route tokens #35661
    area-mvc, feature-routing
  • Add optional culture param to indexer of IStringLocalizer #28047
    enhancement, area-mvc, feature-localization, design-proposal, Backlog
  • Expose location changing event for NavigationManger #14962
    Needs: Design, enhancement, area-blazor, severity-major, affected-medium, User Story, Priority:2, Bottom Up Work, feature-blazor-builtin-components, Backlog
  • Add horizontal scrolling support to Virtualize component #28813
    help wanted, enhancement, area-blazor, good first issue, severity-blocking, affected-medium, feature-blazor-virtualization, Backlog
  • Implement extension method to go from Position -> SourceLocation #35679
    area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, razor.tooling-fundamentals, Razor.Tooling

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore #35745
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0] Call next middleware correctly for rewrite with skip #35743
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Fix keyboard input for 'time' and 'datetime-local' inputs #35742
    area-blazor
  • Move IResultsExtension to M.A.Http namespace (#35717) #35741
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Backport API persistence feedback changes #35738
    Servicing-consider
  • Remove John's assignments #35734
  • Complain if a route parameter is not used or cannot be bound. #35732
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update RazorPage template to be able to be SxS with previous version #35731
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc
  • Quarantine SignalR test #35730
    area-signalr
  • Update SPA submodule for RC1 #35729
    Servicing-consider
  • [SPA] Update spa templates submodule #35720
  • Use ArrayPool as default pool fallback #35719
    area-runtime
  • Big-endian fixes: Guid handling in KeyRingBasedDataProtector.cs #35715
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Big-endian fixes: binary data in RenderBatch #35714
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Big-endian fixes: Kestrel IP/socket address handling #35713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Big-endian fixes: Kestrel string processing #35711
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #35706
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Update timeouts in Java tests #35687
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore #35740
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore dotnet/runtime #35736
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1
  • Always download blazor-hotreload.js from app root #35737
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Call next middleware correctly for rewrite with skip #35708
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix keyboard input for 'time' and 'datetime-local' inputs #35682
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Update .NET SDK to `6.0.100-rc.2.21424.34` #35691
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Complain when returning IActionResult from MinimalAction #35710
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore #35735
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc2

    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #35718
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc2

    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Fix 'HeadOutlet' getting trimmed away for Blazor WebAssembly prerendered apps after publish #35671
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2

    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Fix key comparison for more than 10 elements in AdaptiveCapacityDictionary #35705
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0-rc1
  • Release object URL after image for resize has loaded #35499
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Don't cache CanReuse value #35676
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0] Avoid using new C# language features in Razor code generation #35703
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Update HotReloadAgent to SDK https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet… #35704
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Fix key comparison for more than 10 elements in AdaptiveCapacityDictionary #35685
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine two tests #35690
    7.0-preview1
  • Update HotReloadAgent to SDK https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet… #35673
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Avoid using new C# language features in Razor code generation #35680
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore #35694
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc2

    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc2
  • Workaround dotnet/core-eng#14186 #35688
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #35674
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35678
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore #35681
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore dotnet/runtime #35677
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Apply persistence api review feedback #31147
    area-blazor
  • Add support for WithTags extension method #35672
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
  • Blazor input component support when EditContext is not supplied #35640
    area-blazor
  • Update templates to use scoped CSS #35658
    area-mvc
  • Identity UI Bootstrap 5.1 tweaks #35467
    area-identity
  • Update RazorPage template to be able to be SxS with previous version #34598
    area-mvc
  • Add ApiParameterDescription to ApiDescription to represent the request body - 35421 #35654
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore dotnet/runtime #35547
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Include source in RequestDelegateFactory missing required parameter log #35580
    area-runtime
